column4: Hi, when I load a Windows program under Wine, I am getting garbage on the screen making anything unusable,  It's as if the screen was split in half verticaly, both side showing the same stuff, but like I said with garbage (latest Wine), also, if I take a screenshot it's as if everything is normal.
sounds wierd... maby the people at #winehq can help you
none of them is responding :(
how did you install skype? did you use the ubuntu repo, or did you download from homepage?
sorry, wrong person. my bad :)
have you tryed to play around with the video settings in wine?
Yes I did, I turned off window decoration and manager, but no luck.
have you tryed emulateing a virtual desktop?
yes, same issues.
have you tryed disabeling compiz when you run wine?
: yes, same issues
then i'm out of idees. sorry :/
oh, have you tryed to remove and purge wine. deleteing ~/.wine and re-install?
: I am trying that, I'll keep you inform in 5 minutes
---> sudo apt-get remove wine --purge && rm -R ~/.wine && sudo apt-get install wine
oh, and you use the repo from winehq right?
Yes I do
same issues with remove and purging everything :(
and you did delete the ~/.wine folder?
yes I did deleted it
okay, then i have no ide
